Text:
For now this is the only solution for those who are the problem:
 Here's a little tutorial:

 1. Download Click here to get the USB Loader
 2. Extract files
 3. Remove your SD card on your Wii
 4. Connect your SD card into your PC
 5. Open your file * * apps from SD card
 6. Go USBLOADER_GX
 7. remove all files except files to image, theme, language
 8. Go to your download file and extracts
 9. open the folder apps / usbloader_gx
 10. Copy the three files you see boot.dol, icon.png, meta.xml
 11. Paste the folder of your SD card apps / usbloader_gx / ** * Theme file your 3-image *
 12. Put your SD card into your Wii and open HBC (Homebrew Channel)
 and open USBloader
